terms.title: Lend Crypto
terms.subtitle: Lend assets on the Compound protocol
terms.description: The Compound protocol allows you to lend and borrow assets on the Ethereum network. You can lend assets and earn interest directly from your Ledger acccount.
terms.switchLabel: <1>I have read and agree with the </1><0>Terms of Use</0><1>.</1>

1.subtitle: Approve an account to allow the protocol to
1.description: You need to authorize the Compound smart contract to transfer up to a certain amount of assets to the protocol. Approving an account gives permission to the protocol to process future loans.

2.subtitle: Supply assets to earn interest
2.description: Once an account is approved, you can select the amount of assets you want to lend and issue a transaction to the protocol. Interests accrue immediately after the transaction is confirmed.

3.subtitle: Withdraw assets at any time
3.description: You can withdraw your assets and earned interest at any time, partially or entirely, directly from your Ledger account.

success.title: Deposit sent successfully

modal.confirmIdentifierText: Verify that the identifier on your device is the same as the identifier below. Confirm and enter your PIN code if requested.
modal.mcuFirst: Desconecta el cable USB de tu dispositivo.
modal.mcuSecond: Pulsa el botón izquierdo y mantenlo pulsado mientras conectas de nuevo el cable USB hasta que aparezca la pantalla de <1><0>{{repairProcessing}}</0></1>
modal.mcuPin: Please wait for the update to finish
modal.mcuSecondNanoX: Press and hold the left button until <1><0>{{bootloaderOption}}</0></1> appears. Press both buttons to confirm and reconnect your device.
modal.mcuBlueFirst: Press and hold the side button for 10 seconds to turn off the device. Release the button.
modal.mcuBlueSecond: Press and hold the button for at least 5 seconds until the Boot Options are displayed. Tap Bootloader Mode
modal.successText: Reinstala las aplicaciones en tu dispositivo

resetSteps.connect: Connect the {{deviceName}} to your computer using the USB cable.
resetSteps.turnOn: Press the button on the device to turn it on.
resetSteps.falsePin: Enter three wrong PINs to reset the device.
resetSteps.turnOff: Press and hold the side button until {{action}} is displayed.
resetSteps.boot: Press and hold the side button until {{option}} is displayed
resetSteps.recoveryMode: Tap {{mode}} Mode. Wait until the dashboard appears.
resetSteps.openLive: Open the Manager in Ledger Live.
resetSteps.uninstall: Click on the grey trash icon for all apps currently installed on the {{deviceName}}. This makes room for the firmware installer.
resetSteps.disclaimer: Note: Your funds are not affected by this operation, the private keys to access your crypto assets in the blockchain remain secure on your Recovery sheet.

starter.title: Earn staking rewards

candidates.description: 127 individuals elected through voting by the entire token holder community. Votes are updated once every 6 hours.

display.desc: Configurar ajustes generales de Ledger Live.
display.languageDesc: Configura el idioma que aparece en Ledger Live.
display.counterValueDesc: Elige la moneda mostrada al lado de tu saldo y operaciones.
display.regionDesc: Choose your region to set the time zone of Ledger Live.
display.stockDesc: Choose Western to display market increases in blue or Eastern to display them in red.
display.carouselVisibilityDesc: Enable visibility of the carousel on Portfolio

currencies.desc: Select a crypto asset to edit its settings.
currencies.confirmationsNbDesc: Establece el número de confirmaciones de red para que una transacción se marque como confirmada.

profile.passwordDesc: Set a password to secure the Ledger Live data on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses.
profile.passwordAutoLockDesc: Automatically lock Ledger Live when inactive.
profile.softResetDesc: Borra la caché de Ledger Live para forzar la resincronización con la blockchain.
profile.hardResetDesc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction histories and settings.
profile.developerModeDesc: Mostrar aplicaciones de desarrollador y testnet en el Manager.
profile.analyticsDesc: Enable analytics to help Ledger improve user experience. This includes clicks, page visits, redirections, actions (send, receive, lock, etc), end of page scrolls, (un)installing and app version, number of accounts, crypto assets and operations, session durations, the Ledger device type and firmware.
profile.reportErrorsDesc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger improve its products.
profile.launchOnboardingDesc: Set up a new device or restore an existing device. Accounts and settings are kept.

about.desc: Información sobre aplicaciones, Términos y Condiciones y Política de Privacidad.

help.desc: Saber más sobre Ledger Live u obtener ayuda.
help.faqDesc: If you have a problem, get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.termsDesc: Al utilizar Ledger Live consideramos que aceptas nuestros Términos y Condiciones.
help.privacyDesc: Refer to our Privacy Policy to learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use them.

experimental.desc: Prueba las funcionalidades experimentales y dínos qué te parecen
experimental.disclaimer: These are experimental features we provide on an "as is" basis for our tech savvy community to test. They may change, break or be removed at any time. By enabling them, you agree to use them at your own risk.

hardResetModal.title: Restablecer Ledger Live
hardResetModal.desc: Reset Ledger Live to erase all settings and accounts on your computer. You can then choose your password and add your accounts back with your Ledger device. The private keys giving access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and are backed up by your Recovery phrase.

softResetModal.title: Borrar caché
softResetModal.desc: Clearing the cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are preserved. The private keys to access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and Recovery sheet.

resetFallbackModal.title: Es necesaria la acción del usuario
resetFallbackModal.part1: No se ha podido borrar la carpeta caché. Bórrala manualmente.
resetFallbackModal.part2: Haz clic en el botón Abrir carpeta para
resetFallbackModal.part5: Ahora puedes reiniciar la aplicación normalmente.

removeAccountModal.title: Quitar cuenta
removeAccountModal.desc: This will not affect your crypto assets. Existing accounts can always be added again.

openUserDataDirectory.title: Ver datos de usuario
openUserDataDirectory.desc: View the user data stored on your computer, including your accounts, caches and settings.

repairDevice.title: Repara tu dispositivo Ledger
repairDevice.descSettings: Use this to restore your Ledger device if it froze during a firmware update.
repairDevice.desc: Selecciona el estado de tu dispositivo Ledger.

exportLogs.title: Guardar registros
exportLogs.desc: Saving Ledger Live logs may be needed for troubleshooting purposes.

hideEmptyTokens.title: Hide empty token accounts
hideEmptyTokens.desc: Hide token accounts with zero balance on the Accounts page.

tokenBlacklist.title: Hidden tokens
tokenBlacklist.desc: You can hide tokens by going to the parent account then right-clicking on the token and selecting 'Hide token'.

setPassword.title: Bloqueo por contraseña
setPassword.subTitle: Set the password
setPassword.desc: Keep your password safe. Losing it means resetting Ledger Live and adding the accounts again.

disablePassword.title: Desactivar bloqueo por contraseña
disablePassword.desc: Los datos de Ledger Live se guardarán sin codificar en tu ordenador. Esto incluye nombres, transacciones y direcciones públicas de cuentas.

update.updateAvailable: Update to Ledger Live version {{version}} is available
update.error: Error durante la actualización. Por favor, descárgala de nuevo
update.nightlyWarning: This version cannot auto-update. Please install the latest version manually

crash.title: Something went wrong
crash.description: Please check our support articles for possible solutions. If the problem persists, save the logs using the button below and provide them to Ledger Support.

exportOperationsModal.title: Historial de operaciones
exportOperationsModal.desc: Seleccione las cuentas para las que guardar el historial de operaciones
exportOperationsModal.descSuccess: The CSV file of your operation history was saved successfully in the selected folder

start.title: Bienvenido a Ledger Live
start.themeDesc:
Let's start by choosing how Ledger Live looks to you.
You can change this again in your settings.

init.title: Empieza a utilizar tu dispositivo Ledger.

selectDevice.title: Selecciona tu dispositivo
selectDevice.usbOnlyTooltip: Ledger Live Desktop todavía no es compatible con Bluetooth

disclaimer.note2: Utiliza 8 dígitos para una seguridad óptima.
disclaimer.note3: Never use a device with a pre-installed PIN or Recovery phrase.

nano.step2: Press the left or right button to navigate through the on-screen instructions.
nano.step4: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons together to confirm.
nano.step5: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

nanoX.step2: Press both buttons together to confirm <1><0>{{setUpAsNewDevice}}</0></1>.
nanoX.step3: Pulsa el botón izquierdo o derecho para seleccionar un dígito.
nanoX.step4: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

blue.step3: Choose a PIN with 4 to 8 digits.

nano.step2: Press the left or right button to navigate through the on-screen instructions.
nano.step4: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons together to confirm.
nano.step5: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

nanoX.step2: Pulsa ambos botones a la vez según lo indicado en la pantalla de tu {{productName}}.
nanoX.step4: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons to validate.
nanoX.step5: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN code. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

blue.step3: Choose a PIN with 4 to 8 digits.

initialize.title: Write down your Recovery phrase
initialize.desc: Your 24-word Recovery phrase is the <1>only backup</1> of all your private keys.

nano.step1: Escribe la <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> en la posición 1 en una hoja de Recuperación en blanco.
nano.step2: Press the right button and continue to write down all 24 words.
nano.step3: Confirm each word of your Recovery phrase: select it then confirm it by pressing both buttons together.

blue.step1: Write down each word on a blank Recovery sheet in the exact order.
blue.step2: Pulsa <1><0>{{seedNext}}</0></1> y escribe todas las palabras hasta que aparezca la pantalla <3><0>{{seedConfirmation}}</0></3>.
blue.step3: Enter each word to confirm your Recovery phrase.

restore.title: Enter your Recovery phrase
restore.desc: Enter the Recovery phrase using your Recovery sheet.

nano.step1: Choose the length of your Recovery phrase.
nano.step2: Enter the first letters of <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> until the suggestions appear.
nano.step3: Choose <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> from the suggested words by pressing both buttons together.
nano.step4: Repeat the process for all words.

blue.step1: Select the length of your Recovery phrase.
blue.step2: Type the first word of your Recovery phrase. Tap the word when it appears.
blue.step3: Repeat the process for all words.

disclaimer.note1: Anyone who has your Recovery phrase also has your crypto assets.
disclaimer.note2: Never use a device with a pre-installed PIN or Recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note3: Store your Recovery phrase in a safe place, out of sight.
disclaimer.note4: Ledger does not store your private keys, nor ever asks for them.

genuineCheck.title: Lista de comprobación de seguridad
genuineCheck.descGeneric: Antes de seguir, repasa la lista de comprobación de seguridad
genuineCheck.descRestore: Antes de empezar, confirma lo siguiente:

step1.title: Did you choose your own PIN?

step2.title: Did you save your own Recovery phrase?

title.pinFailed: Did you choose your own PIN?
title.recoveryPhraseFailed: Did you save your own Recovery phrase?

desc.pinFailed: Never use a device with a pre-installed PIN. Please contact Ledger Support if in doubt.
desc.recoveryPhraseFailed: Save the Recovery phrase only if it is displayed on your device, to you alone. Please contact Ledger Support if in doubt.

setPassword.title: Bloqueo por contraseña (opcional)
setPassword.desc: Set a password to secure the Ledger Live data on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses

disclaimer.note1: Keep your password safe. Do not share it.
disclaimer.note2: Losing your password means resetting Ledger Live and adding the accounts again.
disclaimer.note3: Restablecer Ledger Live no afectará a tus criptoactivos.

analytics.title: Errores y analítica
analytics.desc: Share anonymized data to help Ledger improve the security of its products and services

shareAnalytics.title: Analíticas
shareAnalytics.desc: Enable analytics to help Ledger improve user experience.

mandatoryContextual.item2: Visitas a páginas dentro de la aplicación
mandatoryContextual.item5: Desplazamiento hasta el final de la página
mandatoryContextual.item7: Número de cuentas, criptoactivos y operaciones
mandatoryContextual.item8: Duración general y de la sesión de la página
mandatoryContextual.item9: Tipo de dispositivo Ledger y firmware

sentryLogs.title: Informes de bugs
sentryLogs.desc: Enviar informes automáticamente para ayudar a Ledger a corregir bugs.

technicalData.title: Datos técnicos*
technicalData.desc: Ledger recopilará automáticamente datos técnicos totalmente anónimos para ayudar a mejorar la experiencia de usuario.

mandatoryContextual.title: Datos técnicos
mandatoryContextual.item1: ID de aplicación único y anónimo
mandatoryContextual.item2: Versión, idioma y región de Ledger Live
mandatoryContextual.item3: Versión del sistema operativo, lenguaje y región

finish.title: ¡Tu dispositivo está listo!
finish.desc: Install apps on your device and access the Portfolio

TransactionConfirm.title: Please confirm the operation on your device to finalize it
TransactionConfirm.warning: Always verify the address displayed on your device exactly matches the one given by the {{recipientWording}}
TransactionConfirm.secureContract: Verify the deposit details on your device before sending it. The contract address is provided securely so you don’t have to verify it.

titleWording.send: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.claimReward: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.freeze: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.unfreeze: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.vote: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.delegate: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.undelegate: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.redelegate: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.claimRewardCompound: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.switchLabel: I have read and agree with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

stellar.memoWarningText: When using a Memo, carefully verify the type used with the recipient

cosmos.memoWarningText: When using a memo, carefully check the information with the recipient

generic.title: {{message}}
generic.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

AccountAwaitingSendPendingOperations.title: There is a pending operation for this account.
AccountAwaitingSendPendingOperations.description: Wait for the operation to go through.

AccountNameRequired.title: Se requiere un nombre de cuenta.

AlgorandASANotOptInInRecipient.title: Recipient account has not opted in the selected ASA.

NoAccessToCamera.title: Please ensure your system has a camera, that it is not in use by another application and that Ledger Live has permission to use it.

ClaimRewardsFeesWarning.title: The rewards are smaller than the estimated fees to claim them

CompoundLowerAllowanceOfActiveAccountErr.title: You cannot reduce the amount approved while having an active deposit.

CosmosBroadcastCodeUnauthorized.title: Unauthorized signature
CosmosBroadcastCodeUnauthorized.description: This account is not authorized to sign this transaction

CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientFunds.title: Insufficient funds
CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientFunds.description: Make sure the account used has enough funds and try again

CosmosBroadcastCodeInvalidAddress.title: Invalid address
CosmosBroadcastCodeInvalidAddress.description: Please check the address and try again

CosmosBroadcastCodeUnknownAddress.title: Unknown address
CosmosBroadcastCodeUnknownAddress.description: Please check the address and try again

CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientCoins.title: Insufficient coins
CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientCoins.description: Make sure the account used has enough funds and try again

CosmosBroadcastCodeMemoTooLarge.title: The Memo field is too long
CosmosBroadcastCodeMemoTooLarge.description: Please reduce the size of the memo text and try again

CurrencyNotSupported.title: {{currencyName}} is not supported
CurrencyNotSupported.description: This crypto asset is not yet supported. Please contact Ledger Support.

DeviceInOSUExpected.title: Lo sentimos, la actualización falló
DeviceInOSUExpected.description: Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo o ponte en contacto con Soporte de Ledger

DeviceHalted.title: Por favor reinicia tu dispositivo Ledger e inténtalo de nuevo
DeviceHalted.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again

DeviceSocketFail.title: Please restart your Ledger device and retry
DeviceSocketFail.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again. ({{message}})

DisconnectedDevice.title: Vaya, la conexión con el dispositivo ha fallado

DisconnectedDeviceDuringOperation.title: Vaya, el dispositivo se ha desconectado
DisconnectedDeviceDuringOperation.description: The connection to the device was lost during an operation. Please try again

FeeEstimationFailed.title: Lo sentimos, el cálculo de comisiones ha fallado.

FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.title: Se requiere actualización de firmware o app
FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.description: Please use the Manager to uninstall all apps then check if a firmware update is available before reinstalling them

HardResetFail.title: Vaya, no se ha podido restablecer.
HardResetFail.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support if in doubt

LatestMCUInstalledError.title: Vaya, no hay nada pendiente de actualizar.
LatestMCUInstalledError.description: Se ha intentado actualizar el microcontrolador del dispositivo sin necesidad. Ponte en contacto con Soporte de Ledger si hay algún problema con tu dispositivo.

LedgerAPI4xx.title: {{message}}
LedgerAPI4xx.description: Por favor, comprueba tu conexión e inténtalo de nuevo o ponte en contacto con el servicio de soporte de Ledger.

LedgerAPI5xx.title: Lo sentimos, inténtalo de nuevo.
LedgerAPI5xx.description: The server could not handle your request. Please try again later or contact Ledger Support. {{message}}

LedgerAPINotAvailable.title: Lo sentimos, los servicios {{currencyName}} no están disponibles.
LedgerAPINotAvailable.description: Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo o ponte en contacto con Soporte de Ledger

ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.title: Vaya, esa ya está instalada
ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.description: Comprueba tu dispositivo para ver qué aplicaciones ya están instaladas

ManagerAppDepInstallRequired.title: {{dependency}} app required
ManagerAppDepInstallRequired.description: If the {{dependency}} app is already installed, please reinstall it with the latest version

ManagerAppDepUninstallRequired.title: Sorry, this app is required
ManagerAppDepUninstallRequired.description: You must first uninstall all apps that require the {{appName}} app

ManagerFirmwareNotEnoughSpace.title: Uninstall all apps from your device
ManagerFirmwareNotEnoughSpace.description: The private keys to access your crypto assets will stay safe on your device and must be backed up on your Recovery sheet.

ManagerNotEnoughSpace.title: Lo sentimos, no queda espacio suficiente.
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.description: Uninstall some apps to free up space. The private keys to access your crypto assets will stay safe on your device.

install.title: Finish app installation in progress?
install.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate the app installation. Please finish the installation to install the apps in the queue.

uninstall.title: Finish app uninstallation in progress?
uninstall.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate the app uninstallations in progress.

update.title: Finish app updates in progress?
update.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate the app updates in progress.

ManagerUninstallBTCDep.title: Lo sentimos, esta aplicación es obligatoria.
ManagerUninstallBTCDep.description: Desinstala la aplicación Bitcoin o Ethereum en último lugar

NetworkDown.title: Vaya, parece que Internet no funciona.
NetworkDown.description: Por favor, revisa tu conexión a Internet

NoAddressesFound.title: Sorry, no accounts were found
NoAddressesFound.description: Something went wrong with the address calculation, try again or contact Ledger Support

NotEnoughBalance.title: Vaya, saldo insuficiente.
NotEnoughBalance.description: Make sure the account used has enough funds

NotEnoughBalanceBecauseDestinationNotCre.title: La dirección del destinatario está inactiva. Envía al menos {{minimalAmount}} para activarla.

NotEnoughGas.title: The ETH balance in the parent account is insufficient for network fees

SwapGenericAPIError.title: Exchange rate expired
SwapGenericAPIError.description: You must confirm the swap before the timer runs out. The exchange rate displayed remains valid for 60 seconds.

TimeoutError.title: Oops, a timeout occurred
TimeoutError.description: It took too long for the server to respond. Please try again

TimeoutTagged.title: Oops, a timeout occurred ({{tag}})
TimeoutTagged.description: El servidor ha tardado demasiado en responder

TransportError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device

TransportRaceCondition.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device

TransportStatusError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device

DeviceShouldStayInApp.title: Por favor, abre la aplicación {{appName}}
DeviceShouldStayInApp.description: Keep the {{appName}} app open while we find your accounts

UnexpectedBootloader.title: Vaya, tu dispositivo no debería estar en modo Bootloader
UnexpectedBootloader.description: Please restart your device or contact Ledger Support

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.title: Update cancelled
UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: Inténtalo de nuevo o ponte en contacto con Soporte de Ledger.

UserRefusedOnDevice.title: Action rejected
UserRefusedOnDevice.description: User rejected the operation on the device

TransactionRefusedOnDevice.title: Operation denied on device
TransactionRefusedOnDevice.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support if in doubt

UserRefusedAddress.title: Dirección de recepción rechazada.
UserRefusedAddress.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support if in doubt

UpdateYourApp.title: Se requiere la actualización de la aplicación.
UpdateYourApp.description: Desinstala y vuelve a instalar la aplicación {{managerAppName}} en el Manager

DeviceOnDashboardExpected.title: Return to the Dashboard
DeviceOnDashboardExpected.description: Please navigate back to the Dashboard on your device

WrongDeviceForAccount.title: Something went wrong
WrongDeviceForAccount.description: Please check that your hardware wallet is set up with the Recovery phrase or passphrase associated to the selected account.

DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.title: Se requiere la actualización de la aplicación.
DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.description: Desinstala y vuelve a instalar la aplicación {{managerAppName}} en el Manager

InvalidAddress.title: Esta no es una dirección {{currencyName}} válida.

InvalidAddressBecauseDestinationIsAlsoSo.title: La dirección del destinatario es la misma que la dirección del remitente

CantOpenDevice.title: Oops, couldn't connect to device
CantOpenDevice.description: Device detected but connection failed. Please try again or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

ETHAddressNonEIP.title: Autocomprobación no disponible: comprueba detenidamente la dirección.

CantScanQRCode.title: No se ha podido escanear este código QR: autocomprobación no soportada por esta dirección

FeeNotLoaded.title: Couldn't load fee rates. Please set manual fees

GasLessThanEstimate.title: This may be too low. Please increase

UnknownMCU.title: Versión de MCU desconocida
UnknownMCU.description: Por favor, ponte en contacto con el Soporte de Ledger

list.1: Disconnect and reconnect the USB cable without pressing any buttons.
list.2: Press both buttons together three times to display the Dashboard.
list.3: Open the Manager and click Update firmware.

UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountReceive.title: Cannot receive in subaccounts
UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountReceive.description: If you want to receive funds, please use the parent account

UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountSend.title: Cannot send from subaccounts yet
UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountSend.description: This feature will be added at a later stage due to changes recently introduced by the Babylon update.

RecommendUndelegation.title: Please undelegate the account before emptying it

NotSupportedLegacyAddress.title: This legacy address format is no longer supported

BtcUnmatchedApp.title: That's the wrong app
BtcUnmatchedApp.description: Open the '{{managerAppName}}' app on your device

DeviceNameInvalid.title: Please choose a device name without '{{invalidCharacters}}'

LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.title: {{message}}
LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum apps required
ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.description: Install the latest Bitcoin and Ethereum apps first.

UserRefusedDeviceNameChange.title: Rename cancelled on device
UserRefusedDeviceNameChange.description: Try again and allow renaming on your device

SyncError.title: Synchronization error
SyncError.description: Some accounts could not be synchronized.

TronNoFrozenForBandwidth.title: No assets to unfreeze
TronNoFrozenForBandwidth.description: You do not have assets to unfreeze associated to Bandwidth

TronNoFrozenForEnergy.title: No assets to unfreeze
TronNoFrozenForEnergy.description: You do not have assets to unfreeze associated to Energy

TronUnfreezeNotExpired.title: Unfreeze is not available yet
TronUnfreezeNotExpired.description: You need to wait 3 days after your last Freeze operation

TronInvalidVoteCount.title: Vote format is incorrect
TronInvalidVoteCount.description: You can only vote using round numbers

TronRewardNotAvailable.title: Reward is not claimable yet
TronRewardNotAvailable.description: You need to wait 24 hours between claims

TronNoReward.title: There is no reward to claim

TronInvalidFreezeAmount.title: Amount to freeze cannot be lower than 1

TronSendTrc20ToNewAccountForbidden.title: Sending TRC20 to a new account won't activate it
TronSendTrc20ToNewAccountForbidden.description: The recipient account must be activated prior to sending TRC20 to it. Send either TRX or TRC10 to an account to activate it.

TronTransactionExpired.title: Transaction has expired
TronTransactionExpired.description: Signature must be applied within 30 seconds. Please try again.

TronNotEnoughEnergy.title: Not enough Energy to send this token

PairingFailed.title: Pairing unsuccessful
PairingFailed.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support if in doubt.

GenuineCheckFailed.title: Genuine check failed
GenuineCheckFailed.description: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact Ledger Support if in doubt.

EthAppPleaseEnableContractData.title: Please enable contract data in the Ethereum app settings

NotEnoughBalanceInParentAccount.title: Insufficient balance in the parent account

FeeTooHigh.title: Network fees are above 10% of the amount

StellarMemoRecommended.title: A memo may be required when sending to this recipient
